Date: Wednesday, 4/12/1991
Subject: Ivan Rodriguez learns new position
Ivan Rodriguez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "2" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Troy O'Leary
Dear Sir,
Troy O'Leary has an AVG of .321 at AA Columbia Fireflies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Torey Lovullo
Dear Sir,
Torey Lovullo shouldn't play at AA Columbia Fireflies!
He has an AVG of .209 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Leo Garcia
Dear Sir,

That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Scouting Director
